name: Spot the differences puzzle game – Pro
name_original: Spot the differences puzzle game – Pro
description:
Version without ads.
Brain training puzzle game to find the 7 differences in pictures
Download our Spot the differences –Puzzle Game to find the 7 differences between two pictures. Train your mind with our photo puzzle game and develop your visual scanning skills. Test your observation skills as you compare two nearly identical pictures and try to spot the differences! A fun way to train your brain with our brain training puzzle game with real photos.
How to play:
Spot 7 differences between two images! This is a classic find the difference game. Once you find the difference, tap the area on the screen to spot the difference between two pictures. Spot the difference is a great way to exercise the brain and improve your visual observation skills!
If you like our app, please rate and comment to help us improve!
developers: Pocket School - Basic education to learn for adults & kids
